typesense/typesense

search engine for instant, typo-tolerant search on your data

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • markup-based typesetting tool like LaTeX but simpler
  • Expresses Japanese sentences via TypeScript types
  • TypeScript utility types for everyday coding
  • full-text, vector, and hybrid search engine for browser or server
  • BERT-based retrieval for fast, scalable search over large text collections
  • AI framework for semantic search, workflows, and large language models
  • end-to-end typesafe APIs for TypeScript apps
  • semantic code search by meaning, not just keywords
  • lightweight search engine, drop-in Elasticsearch alternative, quick setup
